sect1.title: Push
sect1.para: Push Change to the other repository. You must push change to bare repository. If you push change to repository with working copy, there are unexpected result.

sect2.title: Branch
sect2.para: Source: The source branch which will push to other repository
Remotes: The remote branch of the other repository.

sect2.title: Destination
sect2.para: Arbitary URL: The remote repository url.

sect2.title: Options
sect2.para: Force Overwrite Existing Branch(May discard changeds)
Use Thin Pack(For slow network connections)
